content.rendered:
Thank you for your interest in jobs at the embassy. We no longer accept paper applications for advertised jobs. All applicants must apply  for current vacancies through the Electronic Recruitment Application (ERA) 

USAID and Peace Corps continues to use the manual application process. Visit the links below to learn more.

Embassy Job Opportunities
